mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_pw, u.user_email, r.id AS role_id, r.role_name, u.user_status, u.create_at, u.update_at FROM user_info u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.user_id = #{id} AND u.user_pw = #{password} AND u.user_status = 'active' AND r.role_name = 'admin'
